description:
A 25-year-old serious and ordinary office worker.
Since childhood, he has had an uncanny ability to switch between the world of dreams and reality.
In the dream world, he takes the form of a boy and calls himself "http://anidb.net/character/139179 [Kazuhiho]" and spends his days adventuring with his lunch box.
No effort is spared for a comfortable sleep.
name: Kitase Kazuhiro
